channel.title: Diffusion on Serendipity's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Diffusion on Serendipity's Blog

item.description:
Study on Score-Based Generative Modeling

(●’◡’●)

About Score-Based Generative Modeling: the following article has given a clear explanation: Diffusion Model: SDE

A simple conclusion of the Score-Based Generative Modeling through Stochastic Differential Equations: Generalization of discrete models such as DDPM to continuous SDE forms, through predictor-corrector samplers to correct the solution of a numerical SDE solver.
